mapper.select: select message_id, case when u.nickname is null then '' else u.nickname end as nickname, case when sm.name is null then '' else sm.name end as supermarket, som.status as status, som.view_status as view_status from self_order_message som left join `user` u on u.user_id = som.user_id left join `supermarket` sm on sm.user_id = som.user_id where self_order_id =#{selfOrderId}
